name: John Doe
subject: Full-Stack Web Development
description: John Doe is a passionate Full-Stack Web Developer with expertise in modern web technologies including React, Node.js, and database management. He enjoys mentoring students and building scalable applications.

name: Jane Smith
subject: Data Science with Python
description: Jane Smith is a seasoned Data Scientist specializing in Python, machine learning, and AI. She has extensive industry experience and loves teaching data-driven decision-making techniques.

name: Alice Johnson
subject: UI/UX Design Fundamentals
description: Alice Johnson is a creative UI/UX designer with a deep understanding of user psychology and design principles. She helps students craft user-friendly and visually appealing interfaces.

name: Michael Brown
subject: Android App Development
description: Michael Brown is an expert in Android development, specializing in Kotlin and Jetpack Compose. He has worked on multiple industry-level applications and enjoys sharing his knowledge with aspiring developers.

name: David Wilson
subject: Cybersecurity Basics
description: David Wilson is a cybersecurity specialist with expertise in ethical hacking and network security. He has trained professionals worldwide to secure systems against cyber threats.

name: Emily White
subject: Machine Learning for Beginners
description: Emily White is a machine learning engineer passionate about AI and automation. She helps students grasp complex concepts with real-world examples and hands-on projects.

name: Robert Green
subject: Blockchain Development
description: Robert Green is a blockchain developer specializing in smart contracts and decentralized applications. He loves teaching students about blockchain technology and its real-world applications.

name: Sophia Martinez
subject: Cloud Computing Essentials
description: Sophia Martinez is a cloud computing expert with hands-on experience in AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud. She helps students build and deploy scalable cloud applications.
